summary: A comprehensive Django authentication test suite that validates core components such as backends, models, forms, views, middleware, signals, management commands, hashers, tokens, and admin integration. It covers standard and custom user models, multiâ€‘database routing, deprecation behavior, permission handling, remote user support, and security edge cases across the authentication workflow.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, security, and compatibility of Django's authentication system and its extensions, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable behavior in production environments.
